name: Fish in a Bowl (Grifyolo)
description:
Fish in a Bowl

My son absolutely loves I Am Fish so I told him we can learn how to make our own version. I can't code so this was all done with Playmaker and Unity. Can you make it to freedom in the pond? Be careful not to fall too far onto the ground or it will be an unhappy end!

  • Controller left thumbstick, WASD or Arrow Keys to move the Fish
  • Controller right thumbstick or mouse to move the camera
  • SPACEBAR to restart
